abstract: College Basketball Roundup; University of Connecticut men's basketball team defeats University of Memphis, 72-58,to win American Athletic Conference championship; other college men's and women's basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Connecticut had a 72-58 victory over Memphis on Sunday in the American Athletic Conference championship game in Orlando, Fla.

headline.main: UConn Men Get First Title in Conference Since 2011
headline.print_headline: UConn Men Get First Title in Conference Since 2011

snippet: Connecticut had a 72-58 victory over Memphis on Sunday in the American Athletic Conference championship game in Orlando, Fla.
